name: Verify Interactive – Numerical Reasoning
description: Assesses how the candidate comprehends numerical information in various formats.

name: Verify Interactive – Deductive Reasoning
description: Measures the ability to draw logical conclusions based on information provided, identify strengths and weaknesses of arguments, and complete scenarios using incomplete information.

name: Verify Interactive – Inductive Reasoning
description: Evaluates ability to identify specific patterns in data or situations and generalize that information to broader contexts.

name: Personality Assessment
description: Improves hiring process with science-backed personality assessments that reveal each candidate's preferences, motivations, and remote-work capability.

name: Situational Judgment Test
description: Matches candidates' behavioral fit to your roles with a situational judgment test, typically administered early in the assessment process.

name: Technical Skills Assessment
description: Measures knowledge of 200+ technology concepts in less than 15 minutes for roles like Full Stack, Front-end, Data Science, and more.

name: Verify – Verbal Ability
description: Measures the ability to read written passages and comprehend the text, interpret tone and author intent, identify main ideas, and predict author responses.

name: Java 8 (New)
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of Java class design, exceptions, generics, collections, concurrency, JDBC, and Java I/O fundamentals.

name: Python 3.6
description: Designed to assess a test taker's general knowledge of Python, covering topics like default operators, decisions and loops, functions, command line and environment, and syntax.

name: Verify – Deductive Reasoning
description: An online ability assessment that can be used to support both pre- and post-hire assessment processes, measuring deductive reasoning ability.

name: Verify – Inductive Reasoning (2014)
description: A test used for job candidates applying to jobs at all levels that require logical reasoning ability.

name: Verify – General Ability Screen
description: A measure of general mental ability or 'g', targeted at entry-level roles, designed to precede other measures to provide process efficiency.

name: Core Java (Entry Level) (New)
description: Multi-choice test that measures the knowledge of basic Java constructs, OOP concepts, file handling, exception handling, threads, generic class, and inner class.

name: Graduate + 8.0 Job Focused Assessment
description: A short, targeted, globally applicable assessment which includes a short cognitive ability measure, designed for professional level positions appropriate for recent college graduates.

name: Verify G+ - Ability Test
description: A highly predictive test of general mental ability with a very short completion time, used to support volume recruitment or shortlisting.
